    • Method Detail

      • setupBrowser

        public static void setupBrowser(java.lang.String configName,
                                org.eclipse.swt.browser.Browser browser,
                                IYRCBrowserHandler handler)
        This utility method needs to be called when an RCP Application needs to integrate with a web application.
        Parameters:
        configName - states the server configuration of the web application that needs to be considered by the Infrastructure.
        browser - instance created by the application.
        handler - implementation of the handler which the application has to invoke whenever required.

      • loginToWebApp

        public static YRCWebAppLoginInfo loginToWebApp(java.lang.String configName,
                                               YRCLoginInfo info,
                                               java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,java.lang.String> paramsMap)
        This utility method needs to be called by an RCP application which needs to login to a web application with the sessionID. The application should be based on Sterling Platform. Invoking this method validates the user session and logs in the user to the web application.
        Parameters:
        configName - is the web application name to which login has to be performed. There should exist a config element of the same name in locations.ycfg file
        info - is login information required which is user id and valid token id of the user already logged in application
        paramsMap - can contain key/value pairs of parameters that needs to get posted to the servlet
        Returns:
        an instance of YRCWebAppLoginInfo which indicates Web App Integration Successful or Integration Failure and populates cookies,headers as obtained from the connection's response

      • addCookiesToBrowserSynchronously

        public static YRCWebAppStatus addCookiesToBrowserSynchronously(java.lang.String webAppconfigName,
                                                               org.eclipse.swt.browser.Browser browser)
        This utility method sets the cookies to the Browser.
        Parameters:
        webAppconfigName - of the Web application as given in the locations.ycfg file
        browser - instance to which cookies are set.
        Returns:
        an instance of YRCWebAppStatus which indicates success or failure of the method call

      • formNoUILoginURL

        public static java.lang.String formNoUILoginURL(org.w3c.dom.Element webAppConfigElement)
        This utility method returns a URL formed using the Web App config element
        Parameters:
        webAppConfigElement - is Web App config element of locations.ycfg
        Returns:
        URL corresponding to the Web App config element

      • addCookiesToBrowserAsynchronously

        public static void addCookiesToBrowserAsynchronously(java.lang.String webAppConfigName,
                                                     org.eclipse.swt.browser.Browser browser,
                                                     YRCWebAppLoginInfo webAppLoginInfo,
                                                     IYRCBrowserHandler handler)
        This utility method sets the cookies to the Browser.
        Parameters:
        webAppConfigName - of the Web application as given in the locations.ycfg file
        browser - instance to which cookies are set
        webAppLoginInfo - will be used to obtain cookies and check if login was successful
        handler - will be invoked after the cookies are set

        This method reads the csrf params from the YRCWebAppLoginInfo object provided as input and appends to the url
        Parameters:
        url -
        info -
        Returns:
